FileFormat.FormatDescription: The Interoperable Master Format (IMF) is a file-based media format, and an IMF Package is a collection of media files with accompanying XML data describing the IMF Package structure. The Packing List (PKL) is an XML file that provides a manifest of general information about the files within an IMP, including file sizes and hash values. A PKL file should be found alongside the other IMP component files described within the file.
